<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><ignore_in_now_experience>false</ignore_in_now_experience><name>x_citin_s2p_spoke.hidelock</name><script><![CDATA[var x_citin_s2p_spoke = x_citin_s2p_spoke || {};

x_citin_s2p_spoke.hidelock = (function() {
	"use strict";

 function hideLockIcon() {
    var lockIcons = document.querySelectorAll('.select2-selection__choice__remove');
    for (var i = 0; i < lockIcons.length; i++) {
      lockIcons[i].style.display = 'none';
    }
  }
  hideLockIcon();

	return {

/* set your public API here. For example:
		incrementAndReturnPrivateVar: function() {
			return private_function();
		},
*/
		type:  "hidelock"
	};
})();
]]></script><script_name>hidelock</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>enea@cityinnovate.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-24 20:55:39</sys_created_on><sys_id>3760f2e0879c7d104bbb21f8dabb358d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_citin_s2p_spoke.hidelock</sys_name><sys_package display_value="City Innovate S2P Spoke" source="x_citin_s2p_spoke">f1c532ae87af6110e1684047cebb35f8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="City Innovate S2P Spoke">f1c532ae87af6110e1684047cebb35f8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_3760f2e0879c7d104bbb21f8dabb358d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>enea@cityinnovate.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-24 20:55:39</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>true</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
